alert.note: Alert for Whitley (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued January 03 at 10:57PM EST until January 04 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Advisory continues for the following rivers in Kentucky... Cumberland River at Williamsburg affecting Whitley County. Kentucky River at Heidelberg affecting Lee County. ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH TUESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Cumberland River at Williamsburg. * WHEN...Until early Tuesday afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 PM EST Monday the stage was 17.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is receding, but will run high into Tuesday morning. - Action stage is 17.0 feet. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued by 10 AM EST on Tuesday.
